name: Terminal Velocity Racing League
description:
Try to cross the finish line first!  Move with WASD (Joystick).  Speed up by streamlining with Spacebar (A button).  Slow down with Left Shift (X button).

Hit the AR gates or be hit with a slow-down penalty.  Miss too many and get disqualified.  Streamline to go faster, but too much and you risk blacking out.
